title: After approval is granted to the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme (S
clause_text: After approval is granted to the Slum Rehabilitation Scheme (S.R.S.), the land earmarked for S.R.S. may be further subdivided, if necessary, to carve out separate plots for the Rehabilitation Component, Free-Sale Component and the Amenity Component. Both, the Plot area and the Built-up area of the said plots shall be mentioned separately in Sq.m. in the lease agreements as well as Record of Rights.
section: The Minimum Tenement Density to be achieved in S.R.S. :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
